# Phase Goal: 002_IMPLEMENT


## Phase Objective
Implement all core functionality for the todo app including task list management, completion tracking, and data persistence.

## Success Criteria
- [ ] **Core Features**: All MVP features implemented and working
- [ ] **Testing**: >80% code coverage with comprehensive test suite
- [ ] **Quality**: All linters pass, no critical bugs

## Key Deliverables
| Deliverable | Description | Acceptance Criteria |
|-------------|-------------|---------------------|
| Task List Component | Core UI component for displaying tasks | Renders correctly, passes all tests |
| Completion Feature | Ability to mark tasks complete/incomplete | Persists state, visual feedback works |
| Test Suite | Comprehensive unit and integration tests | >80% coverage, all tests pass |

## Progress Tracking
- **Current Status**: Not started
- **Blockers**: Waiting on architecture design
- **Next Milestone**: Complete project setup
